name: Electric control cabinet for shrinking machine
description:
and washing machine with dryer

Control cabinet (Ex-de) for zone 1

Equipment:
- 1 x main switch
- 1 x Emergency Off switch
- 1 x FI switch
- 2 x motor protection switch
- 1 x PLC
- 2 x double push buttons

Terminals for
- Emergency Off switch
- Heater (shrinking machine)
- Pneumatic cylinder (shrinking machine)
- Sensors (shrinking machine)
- Pump motor
- Blower motor
